notes:
English models for MorphoDiTa, providing morphological analysis, morphological generation and part-of-speech tagging.

The morphological dictionary is created from Morphium and SCOWL (Spell Checker Oriented Word Lists), the PoS tagger is trained on WSJ (Wall Street Journal).
title: English Models (Morphium + WSJ) for MorphoDiTa
